Sentencas: Low temperature densification and improving the ionic conductivity of doped ceria electrolyte is important for the realization of efficient intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell system.
Titulo: Low temperature densification by lithium co-doping and its effect on ionic conductivity of samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Herein, we report the effect of lithium co-doping (1, 3, 5 and 7 mol%) in 20 mol% samarium doped ceria on the low temperature sinterability and conductivity.
Titulo: Low temperature densification by lithium co-doping and its effect on ionic conductivity of samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The synthesized nanoparticles by citrate-nitrate combustion method showed a decrease in lattice parameter and increase in oxygen vacancy with lithium content after calcination due to the substitution of Li+ into CeO2 lattice.
Titulo: Low temperature densification by lithium co-doping and its effect on ionic conductivity of samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Upon sintering at 900 degrees C, the density improved and reached a maximum value of 98.6% for 5% Li which exhibited a dense microstructure than at 7% Li.
Titulo: Low temperature densification by lithium co-doping and its effect on ionic conductivity of samarium doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: 5%Li co-doping exhibited the best conductivity of 3.65 x 10(-04)-1.81 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) in the operative temperature range of IT-SOFC (550-700 degrees C).Our results demonstrate the significance of lithium as co-dopant for efficient low temperature sintering as well as improving the electrolyte conductivity.
Titulo: Low temperature densification by lithium co-doping and its effect on ionic conductivity of samarium doped ceria electrolyte
